name: tentree InMotion High Rise Leggings - Women's
description:
For all activities in motion. These are a go-to whenever you want snug fitting, easy moving tights - running, yoga, or just hanging out.Stretchy recycled polyester is wicking and comfortable.High-rise waist adds coverage.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.

        Sustainability
